mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS (SELECT *, 1 AS MENU_DEPTH, CAST(LPAD(FILE_GRP_SEQ, 10, '0') AS CHAR(100)) AS SEQ_PATH FROM BM_FILE_GRP WHERE FILE_GRP_SEQ_PARENT = '0' UNION ALL SELECT BFG.*, CTE.MENU_DEPTH + 1 AS MENU_DEPTH, CONCAT(CTE.SEQ_PATH, LPAD(BFG.FILE_GRP_SEQ, 10, '0')) AS SEQ_PATH FROM BM_FILE_GRP BFG INNER JOIN CTE ON BFG.FILE_GRP_SEQ_PARENT = CTE.FILE_GRP_SEQ) SELECT * FROM CTE ORDER BY SEQ_PATH
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BM_FILE ( DATA_SEQ, FILE_GRP_SEQ, FILE_STORED_PATH, STORED_FILE_NM, ORIGIN_FILE_NM, FILE_SIZE, FILE_UPLOAD_DATE, IS_DELETE ) VALUES ( #{DATA_SEQ}, #{FILE_GRP_SEQ}, #{FILE_STORED_PATH}, #{STORED_FILE_NM}, #{ORIGIN_FILE_NM}, #{FILE_SIZE}, NOW(), 'N' );
